scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:wrappers && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:core: npm -w @components/core run build && npm run generate:jsx-types
scripts.build:wrappers: npm -w @components/angular run build && npm -w @components/react run build
scripts.build:apps: npm -w @app/angular run build && npm -w @app/react run build
scripts.start: concurrently -n angular,react -c blue,green "npm run start:angular" "npm run start:react"
scripts.dev: npm run build:core && npm run build:wrappers && npm run start
scripts.dev:all: npm run build:core && npm run build:wrappers && concurrently -n angular,react,storybook -c blue,green,magenta "npm run start:angular" "npm run start:react" "npm run start:storybook"
scripts.dev:angular: npm run build:core && npm run build:angular && npm run start:angular
scripts.dev:react: npm run build:core && npm run build:react && npm run start:react
scripts.dev:storybook: npm run build:core && npm run start:storybook
scripts.build:storybook: npm run build:core && npm -w @app/storybook run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules packages/**/*/node_modules packages/components/angular/dist packages/components/react/dist package-lock.json
